name: Dream Eater
description: You tap into a sleeping creatureâ€™s dreams, sucking from its energy pool. Instantly inflict 4d4 + MOVE psychic damage on a sleeping target in range, regaining half as many hitpoints to yourself. This move does not wake a sleeping creature.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works well if it is the same type as the move used by the last Pokemon.
